column1: 1. In what year did Muslims conquer the Holy Land from the Christians?
2. What do Christians call the land where Jesus lived?
3. From 1015-1241 Christians fought to win back the Holy Land and to force the Muslims to allow Christians to pilgrimage to the Holy Land. What were these battles called?
4. Did the Christians win any land in the Crusades?
5. Did the Muslims lose anything in the Holy Land?
column2: The Muslims agreed to stop harassing, kidnapping, or killing Christians who go to the Holy Land on pilgrimage.
